name: override_eyes_model
description: What material model to use for the eyes
label: Eyes material
items: Do not set a material at all, no matter what is said in the preset
Use the material model specified in the preset
Use a simplistic PBR-style material for the eyes, without any procedural aspects at all. This is geared towards export to external applications
Use texture-based material for the eyes, without any particular procedural aspects. This is the material which is closest to the original MakeHuman materials
Use a fully procedural material for the eyes. This allows controlling many aspects but might be unsuitable for animation
